src:
Sinopsis Person Who Gives Happiness Ep32-36 Tayang di TransTV
03 Nov 2019, 16:10 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Pada pekan awal November 2019, Trans TV akan menayangkan drama Korea 'Person Who Gives Happiness' episode 32-36 yang disiarkan pada pukul 10.00 WIB. (dok. MBC Drama via YouTube)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Pada pekan awal November 2019, Trans TV akan menayangkan drama Korea 'Person Who Gives Happiness' episode 32-36 yang disiarkan pada pukul 10.00 WIB. Berikut sinopsisnya.Sinopsis 'Person Who Gives Happiness' Episode 32Pimpinan Lee pulang dan menemukan So-jung pergi dari rumah. Ia memarahi Gun-woo dan menyuruhnya mencari So-jung. Namun, So-jung malah memberikan surat pemutusan adopsi dan menyatakan cinta pada Gun-woo. Hal itu membuat Pimpinan Lee pingsan.Sementara itu, Nyonya Park marah karena Gun-sook membocorkan pembicaraan yang menyebutkan Eun-hee sedikit gila. Nyonya Park juga memarahi asisten rumah tangga yang memberi tahu Gun-sook bahwa Eun-hee pernah menjadi pembantunya.Di sisi lain, Eun-hee kaget ketika melihat foto Eun-ah saat mengunjungi Pimpinan Lee di rumah sakit.Drama Korea Person Who Gives Happiness episode 32 akan tayang di Trans TV, Senin (4/11)Sinopsis 'Person Who Gives Happiness' Episode 33Eun-hee menangis ketika menyadari Eun-ah, sang adik yang selama ini dicari, ialah So-jung yang selama ini berada di sekitarnya dan tumbuh dewasa dengan sangat baik. Ia menemui So-jung dan menunjukkan foto ketika mereka masih kecil. Hal itu membangkitkan ingatan Eun-ah yang hilang.Kedua bertemu kembali di panti asuhan tempat mereka dirawat dulu. Eun-hee dan So-jung (Eun-ha) saling menangis dan berpelukan.Sementara itu, rambut Ha-yoon mulai rontok akibat penyakit yang diderita. Nyonya Park meminta Suk-jin fokus merawat Ha-yoon. Namun, Suk-jin malah lebih mementingkan Ja-kyung.Drama Korea Person Who Gives Happiness episode 33 akan tayang di Trans TV, Selasa (5/11).


Pada pekan awal November 2019, Trans TV akan menayangkan drama Korea 'Person Who Gives Happiness' episode 32-36 yang disiarkan pada pukul 10.00 WIB. (dok. MBC Drama via YouTube)

Sinopsis 'Person Who Gives Happiness' Episode 34Eun-hee membawa So-jung (Eun-ah) ke rumah dan menceritakan orang tua yang mengadopsinya suka bertengkar dan menyebabkan rumah terbakar. Eun-ah membenci asisten Park karena memperlakukan kakaknya tidak baik.Suk-jin menjadi perbincangan orang kantor karena selalu menempel Ja-kyung. Ia berlaku seperti manajer yang membawakan kopi dan baju Ja-kyung.Sementara itu, Nyonya Park mengancam Gun-sook dengan tuduhan pencurian cek jika menyebarkan info yang didapat tentang Im Si-won.Drama Korea Person Who Gives Happiness 34 akan tayang di Trans TV, Rabu (6/11)Sinopsis 'Person Who Gives Happiness' Episode 35Eun-hee datang ke rumah sakit karena ditelepon Yu-ri menggunakan telepon genggam Wan-sun. Yu-ri takut Ha-yoon bernasib sama dengan Seul sehingga berharap Ha-yoon bisa tinggal bersama Eun-hee.Sementara itu, Suk-jin memperlihatkan sertifikat bahwa Eun-hee bukan ibu angkat Ha-yoon lagi. Ia mengatakan Eun-hee membuat hubungan Ja-kyung dan Ha-yoon rumit.Hal itu membuat Eun-hee menemui Nyonya Park dan mengatakan akan menuntutnya. Ia juga menemui Ja-kyung dan meminta untuk membujuk mertua serta sang suami agar dirinya bisa merawat Ha-yoon hingga dewasa.Drama Korea Person Who Gives Happiness episode 35 akan tayang di Trans TV, Kamis (7/11).Sinopsis 'Person Who Gives Happiness' Episode 36Nyonya Park meminta Nyonya Se Ra membujuk Ja-kyung untuk mengikuti sidang percobaan agar tidak kehilangan Ha Yoon. Nyonya Park juga mengancam akan menyebarkan video Ja-kyung pernah menelantarkan Ha-yoon.Melihat Suk-jin dan Nyonya Park bertengkar, Ha-yoonÂ menangis dan menelepon Eun Hee. Namun, Myoung-sun merekam percakapan Eun-hee dan Ha-yoon.Sementara itu, Gun-woo meminta ayahnya untuk mengumumkan dirinya dan Eun-hee sebagai tunangan. Sedangkan So-jung mengakui pada ayahnya bahwa Eun-hee adalah kakak kandungnya. (chri/rea)
text:
Synopsis Person Who Gives Happiness Ep32-36 Aired on TransTV
03 Nov 2019, 16:10 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


In the early weeks of November 2019, Trans TV will broadcast the Korean drama 'Person Who Gives Happiness' episode 32-36 which airs at 10:00 WIB. (doc. MBC Drama via YouTube)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - In the early week of November 2019, Trans TV will broadcast the Korean drama 'Person Who Gives Happiness' episode 32-36 which airs at 10:00 WIB. Here's the synopsis. Episode 32 Synopsis 'Person Who Gives Happiness' Chairman Lee comes home and finds So-jung leaving home. He scolds Gun-woo and tells him to look for So-jung. However, So-jung instead gives a termination letter of adoption and expresses love for Gun-woo. That made Chairman Lee faint. Meanwhile, Mrs. Park was angry because Gun-sook leaked the talk that said Eun-hee was a little crazy. Mrs. Park also scolds a housekeeper who tells Gun-sook that Eun-hee was once her maid. On the other hand, Eun-hee is shocked when she sees Eun-ah's photo while visiting Chairman Lee in the hospital. Korean Korean Person Who Gives Happiness episode 32 will air on Trans TV, Monday (11/4) Episode 33 Synopsis 'Person Who Gives Happiness' Episode 33Eun-hee cries when she realizes Eun-ah, the younger sister she has been looking for, is So-jung who has been around and grew up very well grown up. He meets So-jung and shows a photo when they were little. That awakens Eun-ah's lost memories. The two meet again at the orphanage where they were treated first. Eun-hee and So-jung (Eun-ha) cry and hug each other. Meanwhile, Ha-yoon's hair starts falling out due to her illness. Mrs. Park asks Suk-jin to focus on caring for Ha-yoon. However, Suk-jin is even more concerned with Ja-kyung. Korean drama Person Who Gives Happiness episode 33 will air on Trans TV, Tuesday (11/5).


In the early weeks of November 2019, Trans TV will broadcast the Korean drama 'Person Who Gives Happiness' episode 32-36 which airs at 10:00 WIB. (doc. MBC Drama via YouTube)

Synopsis 'Person Who Gives Happiness' Episode 34Eun-hee brings So-jung (Eun-ah) home and tells the parents who adopted her who quarrelsome and causes the house to catch fire. Eun-ah hates assistant Park for treating her brother unkindly. Suk-jin is the talk of the office people because he always clings to Ja-kyung. He acts like a manager who brings coffee and Ja-kyung's clothes. Meanwhile, Mrs. Park threatens Gun-sook with a check theft if he spreads the information obtained about Im Si-won. Korean Person Person Gives Happiness 34 will air on Trans TV, Wednesday (6/11) Synopsis of 'Person Who Gives Happiness' Episode 35Eun-hee came to the hospital because of Yu-ri's call using a Wan-sun cellphone. Yu-ri is afraid that Ha-yoon has the same fate as Seul and hopes that Ha-yoon can live with Eun-hee. Meanwhile, Suk-jin shows a certificate that Eun-hee is not Ha-yoon's adopted mother anymore. He says Eun-hee made Ja-kyung and Ha-yoon's relationship complicated. That made Eun-hee meet Mrs. Park and said she would sue him. He also meets Ja-kyung and asks to persuade his in-laws and husband so that he can take care of Ha-yoon until he is an adult. Korean drama Person Who Gives Happiness episode 35 will air on Trans TV, Thursday (7/11). Synopsis' Person Who Gives Happiness' Episode 36 Madam Park asks Lady Se Ra to persuade Ja-kyung to take a trial to avoid losing Ha Yoon. Mrs. Park also threatened to spread the video Ja-kyung once abandoned Ha-yoon. Seeing Suk-jin and Mrs. Park fight, Ha-yoon cried and called Eun Hee. However, Myoung-sun records Eun-hee and Ha-yoon's conversations. Meanwhile, Gun-woo asks his father to announce himself and Eun-hee as engaged. Whereas So-jung admits to her father that Eun-hee is her biological brother. (chri / rea)
